experience.title: Product Designer

positions.title: UI/UX Designer
positions.description_html:
• Gathering and evaluating requirements in collaboration with the client and managers
• Preparing and presenting rough drafts to internal teams and key stakeholders
• Creating high-fidelity prototypes for design concepts
• Optimizing existing user interface designs
• Defining and creating visual guidelines for the product
• Coordinating, supervising and doing the design QA for the final builds
